etymology.description: 中海 (Middle Lake) + 南海 (South Lake) = the combined lakes/compound in Beijing.
etymology.interpretation: Names the area encompassing the Zhonghai and Nanhai lakes west of the Forbidden City; here 海 refers to lakes. By extension it serves as a metonym for China’s central leadership compound.

parts.english: Zhonghai (Middle Lake in Beijing); central sea; middle lake
Nanhai (South Lake in Beijing); south sea; South China Sea

examples.chinese: 中南海位于紫禁城西侧(中南海位於紫禁城西側)。
examples.english: Zhongnanhai is located to the west of the Forbidden City.

examples.chinese: 媒体常用“中南海”代指中国中央领导层(媒體常用「中南海」代指中國中央領導層)。
examples.pinyin: Méitǐ cháng yòng “Zhōngnánhǎi” dàizhǐ Zhōngguó zhōngyāng lǐngdǎo céng.
examples.english: The media often uses “Zhongnanhai” as a metonym for China’s top leadership.

examples.chinese: 游客不能随意进入中南海(遊客不能隨意進入中南海)。
